summary: WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH ENGINE CHECK LIGHT APPEARED ON THE DASHBOARD AND REMAINED ON.  THEN,  VEHICLE STALLED. CONSUMER RESTARTED  VEHICLE  AND PULLED OVER.  CONSUMER HAD  VEHICLE TOWED TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION, AND MECHANIC DETERMINED THAT THE ENGINE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED  DUE TO SLUDGE BUILT UP. *AK
